title: Twin Killer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack a player.
-**Boost** a player.
-**Intercept** a player.
-**Twin Drive** a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If this Is rolled, there will be at least two Twins Killers in the game.
-At the start of the game, you will learn if the other Twin Killer Is one of your neighbours. Each time your neighbours die, you will learn if one of your new neighbours Is a Twin Killer.
-**Boost:** Boost the player's Attack Value depending on your own. Vulnerable and None; +0, Basic: +1, Powerful: +2, Unstoppable: +3, Overkill: +4.
-**Intercept:** If the player Is attacked, you will instead take the hit. Every time you succesfully intercept and block off an attack, you lose a layer of defense.
-**Twin Drive** If the player succesfully attacks another, the attacker gains a layer of defense and attack. You may not use this ability twice in a row.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone that will not submit to your family. (NK Goal)
